text: , better known by the stage name (previously , ), is a Japanese voice actress from Kyoto, Japan. She was a member of Ken Production until 2016. She played Kagome Higurashi in Inuyasha, Mutsumi Otohime in Love Hina, Yoruichi Shihouin in Bleach, Kaname Chidori in Full Metal Panic!, Mion and Shion Sonozaki in Higurashi When They Cry, and Milly Thompson in Trigun. She appeared as a guest in Animethon 21. ==Filmography== ===Television animation=== ;1995 * Crayon Shin-chan, 20 year old C, Hagita, gal B, wife, U.S. Sheng Minori, elementary school B, women, second cousin, Thief ;1996 * Saint Tail, Sister C * Chouja Reideen, Girl * Kiko-chan Smile, Kiko-chan, Hiibaa, Sentarō ;1997 * Cooking Master Boy, Meili * Vampire Princess Miyu, Michiko, Yamanouchi Yō * Cho Mashin Hero Wataru, Sephia ;1998 * Fortune Quest L, Alicia * Trigun, Milly Thompson * Takoyaki Mant-Man, Red * Orphen, Mariabel * Generator Gawl, Masami * Super Doll Licca-chan, Hide * Bubblegum Crisis: Tokyo 2040, Sylia Stingray * Yoshimoto Muchikko Monogatari, Shakutorimushi Brothers Tanaka ;1999 * Pet Shop of Horrors, Jill * Starship Girl Yamamoto Yohko, Momiji Kagariya * Monster Rancher, Narrator * Orphen: The Revenge, Mariabel * Excel Saga, Ropponmatsu * Chibi Maruko-chan, Rie-chan * Weekly Story Land, Junichi Morita * Gregory Horror Show, Toilet Baby, Inko * Monkey Magic, Motte ;2000 * Mighty Cat Masked Niyandar, Kanta Router * Love Hina, Mutsumi Otohime * Ghosts at School, Girl * Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children, Hippō * Inuyasha, Kagome Higurashi ;2001 * X, Hokuto Sumeragi * Angelic Layer, Tamayo Kizaki * Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002, Young Taro Misaki, Young Masao Tachibana * Kokoro Library, Sarara Saeki * Cyborg 009 The Cyborg Soldier, Cyborg 003/Francoise Arnoul * Samurai Girl Real Bout High School, Azumi Kiribayashi * Pretear, Mayune Awayuki * Great Dangaioh, Shima Ryuuko, Romulin * Gyōten Ningen Batseelor, Show Girls * Babel II -
